section.title: LDAP YAML configuration
section.para:
The influence of ldap2 to the YAML fileset of dmsat1 is depicted below.
&t1p; cd /root/puppet-dmsat1/puppet-dmsat1/var/lib/hiera/depzones &t1p; tree --noreport --charset=ASCII . |-- dmsat1 | |-- hosts | | `-- ds3.dmz.dmsat1.org.yaml (node) | |-- platforms | | `-- ldap | | `-- ldap2.yaml (depzone platform instance) | `-- subzones | `-- dmz.yaml (depzone subzone)
In , it is explained how one can adapt the RPM.
